name: league-stats-app
description: A League of Legends player statistics web application

scripts.server: cd server && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 node index.js
scripts.client: cd client && cross-env HTTPS=false NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm start
scripts.build: cd client && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run build
scripts.install-all: cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
